location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 28/47 Tyres and tubes, cements & c. for Bahrain Petroleum Company'

physicalDescription.extent: The documents in the file are arranged in chronological order. There are notes at the end of the file (folios 58-61). The notes refer to documents within the file; they give a brief description of the correspondence with a reference number in red or blue crayon, which refers back to that correspondence in the file.

The foliation is written in pencil, in the top right corner of the recto of each folio. The numbering begins on the first folio after the front cover, on number 1, and ends on the inside of the back cover, on number 62.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence between the Bahrain Petroleum Company Limited (BAPCO) representative, the Political Agents at Bahrain and the Government of India on the delay of cement imported from India and the arrangements to receive 500 tons from RAF instead, and on other various supplies.
